info.title: IMD Management API
info.description: API documentation for IMD (Inisiasi Menyusu Dini) Management System

post.summary: Ask AI a question about IMD data
post.description: Submit a natural language question to AI and get intelligent responses. AI can provide direct answers or generate SQL queries for data analysis.

question.description: Natural language question about IMD data
question.example: Berapa total data IMD yang tercatat bulan ini?
Berapa total data IMD yang tercatat?

is_query.description: Whether the response contains SQL query execution

answer.example: Berdasarkan data yang tersedia, total data IMD yang tercatat adalah 150 records.

query_result.description: Query execution results if AI generated SQL query

query.example: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM imds WHERE deleted_at IS NULL

500.description: Server error - AI service unavailable or internal error

post.description: Execute a SQL SELECT query directly against the IMD database. Only SELECT queries are allowed for security.

query.example: SELECT COUNT(*) as total FROM imds WHERE cara_persalinan = "SC"
SELECT COUNT(*) as total FROM imds WHERE cara_persalinan = "SC"

400.description: Bad request - invalid query or security violation

error.example: Hanya query SELECT yang diizinkan untuk keamanan

post.description: HTTP endpoint wrapper for executing SQL queries with proper request validation

query.example: SELECT nama_pasien, cara_persalinan FROM imds LIMIT 10
SELECT nama_pasien, cara_persalinan FROM imds LIMIT 10

get.description: Retrieve a list of sample questions that users can ask to the AI about IMD data

example: Berapa total data IMD yang tercatat?
Tampilkan data IMD untuk bulan ini
Data IMD dengan durasi paling lama

get.description: Retrieve database schema information for the IMD table to help with query construction

example: SELECT cara_persalinan, COUNT(*) FROM imds GROUP BY cara_persalinan

get.description: Returns complete dashboard data including statistics, charts data, and recent records with advanced filtering capabilities for Flutter mobile app consumption

401.description: Unauthorized access - invalid or missing token

get.description: Returns lightweight statistics data for quick dashboard updates and overview cards
Returns charts data for visualization with optional filtering by chart type for optimized API calls

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: Filter charts data by specific year

parameters.name: month
parameters.description: Filter charts data by specific month (1-12)

parameters.name: cara_persalinan
parameters.description: Filter charts data by delivery method

parameters.name: chart_type
parameters.description: Request specific chart type only for optimized performance

get.summary: Get list of IMD records with filters

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search in patient name, RM number, or staff name

tags.name: Ask AI
tags.description: AI-powered query and question answering system for IMD data analysis

tags.name: Dashboard
tags.description: Dashboard analytics endpoints for IMD data visualization and statistics
